kipu-python documentation
=========================

Welcome to the documentation for **kipu-python**!

kipu-python is an open-source Python library for seamless integration with the Kipu API. Below you will find installation instructions, usage examples, API reference, contribution guidelines, and other helpful information.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   usage
   security
   contributing
   changelog
   api/modules
